sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>On upgrade to Utah, if the model is not OOB and doesn't already have a test set, then add an empty test set.</description>
        <name>Add default test set for upgraded models</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var constants = global.NLUConstants.constants;
    var tables = sn_nlu_workbench.NLUWorkbenchConstants.tables;

    gs.info("Creating test set for models upgraded to Utah.");

    (function() {
        var modelGr = new GlideRecord(tables.SYS_NLU_MODEL);
        modelGr.addQuery("oob", false);
        modelGr.query();

        while (modelGr.next()) {
            var modelId = modelGr.getValue("sys_id");
            var language = modelGr.getValue("language");
            var display_name = modelGr.getValue("display_name");

            gs.info('Name: ' + modelGr.getValue("display_name"));

            var testGr = new GlideRecord(tables.NLU_BATCH_TEST_SET);
            testGr.addQuery("model", modelId);
            testGr.query();

            if (!testGr.hasNext()) {
                sn_nlu_workbench.NLUBatchTestSet.addRecord(
                    constants.DEFAULT_TEST_SET_PREFIX + display_name,
                    language,
                    'uploaded',
                    modelId
                );
            }
        }

        gs.info("Test set for models successfully created.");
    })();
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-07-26 03:38:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6cbc21eb77f01110e114160d9f5a99f8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add default test set for upgraded models</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features" source="sn_nlu_workbench">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6cbc21eb77f01110e114160d9f5a99f8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-08 20:04:04</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Add default test set for upgraded models
